message: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

message: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.
author: Sai Baba

message: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

message: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
author: Rumi

message: There is no end to education. It is not that you read a book, pass an examination, and finish with education. The whole of life, from the moment you are born to the moment you die, is a process of learning.
author: Jiddu

message: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

message: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
author: Rumi

message: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.
author: Rumi

message: Beauty surrounds us, but usually we need to be walking in a garden to know it.
author: Rumi

message: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

message: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

message: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
author: Buddha

message: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are.
author: unknown

message: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
author: Jiddu

message: We all want to be famous people, and the moment we want to be something we are no longer free.
author: Jiddu

message: Religion is the frozen thought of man out of which they build temples.
author: Jiddu

message: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.
author: Jiddu

message: Freedom from the desire for an answer is essential to the understanding of a problem.
author: Jiddu

message: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
author: Loretta Young

message: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
author: Max Muller

message: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

message: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
author: Lao Tzu

message: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

message: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment.
author: Lao Tzu

message: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
author: Lao Tzu

message: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

message: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

message: It is not what you can do for your country, but what you can do for all of mankind.
author: Mike Norton

message: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
author: Buddha

message: To keep the body in good health is a duty. Otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

message: Purity or impurity depends on oneself. No one can purify another.
author: Buddha

message: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

message: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise.
author: Buddha

message: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth.
author: William W. Purkey

message: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
author: Elbert Hubbard

message: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther

message: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

message: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value
author: Albert Einstein

message: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

message: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get
author: W.P Kinsella

message: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

message: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand
author: Hayley Williams

message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
author: Robert F Kennedy

message: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
author: Buddha

message: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets
author: Steve Maraboli

message: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

message: The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off.
author: Gloria Steinem

message: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
author: John Lennon

message: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend – or a meaningful day.
author: Dalai Lama

message: Silence is so much more productive of wisdom and clarity in thinking.
author: Ajahn Brahm

message: There are two things over which you have complete dominion, authority and control – your mind and your mouth.
author: African Buddha

message: Silence is medication for sorrow.
author: Arab Buddha

message: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
author: Martin Buber

message: A joyful life is an individual creation that cannot be copied from a recipe.
author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

message: Forgiveness is attention without judgment. It heals the one who forgives and the one who is forgiven.
author: Deepak Chopra

message: To wish happiness for others, even for those who want to do us harm, is the source of consummate happiness.
author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

message: It is not death or pain that is to be dreaded, but the fear of pain or death.
author: Epictetus

message: Life is 10% what you make it, and 90% how you take it.
author: Ben Franklin

message: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Gandhi

message: Your pain is the breaking of the shell which encloses your understanding
author: Kahlil Gibran

message: Love with attachment consists of waves of emotion, usually creating invisible iron chains.
author: Goenka

message: May all beings find real peace, real harmony, real happiness.
author: Goenka

message: Every thought you think and every word you say is an affirmation for your future.
author: Lousi Hay

message: It’s not the load that breaks you down; it’s the way you carry it.
author: Lena Horne

message: Those who cling to perceptions and views wander the world offending people
author: Buddha

message: Those who cling to perceptions and views wander the world offending people
author: Buddha

message: I died a mineral, and became a plant. I died a plant and rose an animal. I died an animal and I was man. Why should I fear? When was I less by dying?
author: Rumi

message: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
author: Rumi

message: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.
author: Rumi

message: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

message: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
author: Rumi

message: Whoever finds love beneath hurt and grief disappears into emptiness with a thousand new disguises.
author: Rumi

message: Only from the heart Can you touch the sky.
author: Rumi

message: Be loyal and trustworthy. Do not befriend anyone who is lower than youself in this regard.
author: Confucius

message: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
author: Confucius

message: Love’s secret is always lifting its head out from under the covers, “Here I am!”
author: Rumi

message: Be melting snow. Wash yourself of yourself.
author: Rumi

message: Why are you so enchanted by this world, when a mine of gold lies within you?
author: Rumi

message: That which is false troubles the heart, but truth brings joyous tranquillity.
author: Rumi

message: Why should you be unhappy? Every parcel of your being is in full bloom.
author: Rumi

message: Listen! Clam up your mouth and be silent like an oyster shell, for that tongue of yours is the enemy of the soul, my friend. When the lips are silent, the heart has a hundred tongues.
author: Rumi

message: As you start to walk out on the way, the way appears.
author: Rumi

message: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?
author: Rumi

message: How can I know anything about the past or the future, when the light of the Beloved shines only Now.
author: Rumi

message: Very little grows on jagged rock. Be ground. Be crumbled, so wildflowers will come up where you are.
author: Rumi

message: If you are irritated by every rub, how will you be polished?
author: Rumi

message: There is a morning inside you waiting to burst open into Light.
author: Rumi

message: Can you find another market like this? Where, with your one rose, you can buy hundreds of rose gardens?
author: Rumi

message: don’t think the garden loses its ecstasy in winter. It’s quiet, but the roots are down there riotous.
author: Rumi

message: I have lived on the lip of insanity, wanting to know reasons, knocking on a door. It opens. I’ve been knocking from the inside!
author: Rumi

message: In each moment the fire rages, it will burn away a hundred veils. And carry you a thousand steps toward your goal.
author: Rumi

message: Before death takes away what you are given, give away what there is to give.
author: Rumi

message: Isn’t it time to turn your heart into a temple of fire?
author: Rumi

message: Your legs will get heavy and tired. Then comes a moment of feeling the wings you’ve grown, lifting.
author: Rumi

message: You are iron resisting the most enormous magnet there is.
author: Rumi

message: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
author: Rumi

message: Work in the invisible world at least as hard as you do in the visible.
author: Rumi

message: Take sips of this pure wine being poured. Don’t mind that you’ve been given a dirty cup.
author: Rumi

message: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

message: Keep knocking, and the joy inside will eventually open a window and look out to see who’s there.
author: Rumi

message: Gamble everything for love, if you’re a true human being. If not, leave this gathering.
author: Rumi

message: Love is a madman, working his wild schemes, tearing off his clothes, running through the mountains.
author: Rumi

message: Purify your eyes, and see the pure world. Your life will fill with radiant forms.
author: Rumi

message: If all you can do is crawl, start crawling.
author: Rumi

message: Let yourself become living poetry.
author: Rumi

message: This love is the rose that blooms forever.
author: Rumi

message: Tonight the moon kisses the stars.
author: Rumi
